Title: High Risk Behavior
Plot: "Horrifically epic" tryouts for his movie prompt a steamy dialogue between Dawson and Jen that could recast her role in his love life. Jack poses nude for Joey, who feels herself drawn towards intimacy. Pacey sets out to fulfill Andie's dream date and his own.
GuestStars: Shane Callahan, John Bennes, Sallie Hedrick, Cora Holden, Brett Macke
